name: media_pause
description: This function is used to pause the currently playing media on a TV or speaker.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to pause media playback.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to pause media playback.
